name: Margaret
_source: s;Margaret;Stand down.|Lord Valter has ordered us not to attack.
s;SoldierRed;Pardon my rudeness, captain.|But, are we really to follow that madman's orders?|Surely, you see...
s;Margaret;I'll pretend I did not hear that.|However, the next time I hear such slanderous words...|I'll be the one to cut off your tongue.
